###Initial Alpha Diversity Comparisons

## Load Libraries
```{r}
library(readr)
library(phyloseq)
library(tibble)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
```

## Define Paths
```{r}
plastics.rds = "/sharedspace/PlasticPeople/plastics.rds"
```

## Check Phyloseq RDS
Load your phyloseq RDS and `print` it just to be sure things look sane
```{r}
plastics.ps = read_rds(plastics.rds)
print(plastics.ps)
```
